_source.short_desc: For 12 years, SpriggHR has offered a cost-effective, user-friendly performance appraisal process built for small and medium businesses.
_source.long_desc: For 12 years, SpriggHR has offered a cost-effective, user-friendly performance appraisal process specifically built for small and medium sized business. Features include Goal Setting & Progress Updates, Competency Management, Performance Evaluations, Review Templates, and Development Planning. Sprigg facilitates regular touch-point meetings and real-time feedback that promote communication between managers and their people. Sprigg is easy to use and easy to implement.
_source.pricing_details:
Sprigg offers monthly and annual subscriptions based on number of users. Details include:
Twigg (Small Business Essentials) -  starting at $165/ month ($2,000/year)
Sprigg (Comprehensive Performance Management) - starting at $210/month ($2,500/year)
_source.target_audience: Organizations that are in need of a truly simple and inclusive Performance Management experience.

category_features.name: Compensation Management
category_features.definition: Organize and track payroll, bonuses, and additional company benefits and perks distributed to each employee

category_features.name: Competency Management
category_features.definition: Catalog, manage, and develop employee skill sets

category_features.name: Employee Management
category_features.definition: Tools, processes, and management that support the experience of employees throughout their time at a company

category_features.name: Goal Setting / Tracking
category_features.definition: Establish measurable goals and objectives to be tracked and reviewed within a specific time frame

category_features.name: Individual Development Plans
category_features.definition: Document completed by employee to assist with career and personal development to reach short term and long term goals

category_features.name: Onboarding
category_features.definition: Process of familiarizing new stakeholders with the company, a new location, or a service

category_features.name: Performance Management
category_features.definition: Organize and manage the accomplishments and development of employees

category_features.name: Recruitment Management
category_features.definition: Tools to find, attract and asses potential candidates for open job positions within a company

category_features.name: Succession Planning
category_features.definition: Developing a plan to replace employees when they leave/retire so other or new employees are prepared to assume those responsibilities

category_features.name: Training Management
category_features.definition: Track employee's progression through training programs

category_features.name: Anonymous Feedback
category_features.definition: Allow reviewers to provide anonymous feedback to encourage honest conversations

category_features.name: Continuous Feedback
category_features.definition: Provide ongoing performance feedback to employees on a regular basis, rather than giving feedback at designated times

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: View statistics and metrics about a document on a dashboard or by exporting a file

category_features.name: Progress Tracking
category_features.definition: Reporting on how each task or process has advanced since its initiation

category_features.name: Question Library
category_features.definition: Prepopulate common question/answer options

category_features.name: Rater Selection
category_features.definition: Select specific number and type of reviewers to provide feedback for an individual/participant (e.g. peers, supervisors, etc.)

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Surveys & Feedback
category_features.definition: Gauge satisfaction and receive information for improvement and success

category_features.name: 360 Degree Feedback
category_features.definition: A process in which an employee receives feedback and a full analysis of how their peers, managers, and direct reports perceive them.

category_features.name: Applicant Tracking
category_features.definition: Find and manage potential candidates and their applications and resumes through the recruiting life cycle

category_features.name: Benefits Management
category_features.definition: Record employee's benefit plans and selections throughout career progression

category_features.name: Compensation Management
category_features.definition: Organize and track payroll, bonuses, and additional company benefits and perks distributed to each employee

category_features.name: Employee Database
category_features.definition: Electronic storage of staff contact information and job status

category_features.name: Employee Profiles
category_features.definition: Create and view customizable employee profiles to track important information (e.g. job title, manager, contact info, etc.).

category_features.name: Onboarding
category_features.definition: Process of familiarizing new stakeholders with the company, a new location, or a service

category_features.definition: Track and process employee payroll (salaries, wages, etc.)

category_features.name: Performance Management
category_features.definition: Organize and manage the accomplishments and development of employees

category_features.name: Recruitment Management
category_features.definition: Tools to find, attract and asses potential candidates for open job positions within a company

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Time & Attendance
category_features.definition: Track and manage employee's work hours to improve payroll accuracy

category_features.name: Time Off Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage employee time-off, vacation, and sick leave requests

category_features.name: 360 Degree Feedback
category_features.definition: A process in which an employee receives feedback and a full analysis of how their peers, managers, and direct reports perceive them.

category_features.name: Compensation Management
category_features.definition: Organize and track payroll, bonuses, and additional company benefits and perks distributed to each employee

category_features.name: Customizable Templates
category_features.definition: Create, save, and re-purpose formatting

category_features.name: Customization
category_features.definition: Customize the levels of performance/achievement (i.e. numeric or alphabetic)

category_features.name: Individual Development Plans
category_features.definition: Document completed by employee to assist with career and personal development to reach short term and long term goals

category_features.definition: Organize real time feedback and assessments on employees' skills and accomplishments to determine promotions or performance plans

category_features.name: Peer Appraisals
category_features.definition: Peer/teammate feedback and review on individual's performance

category_features.name: Review Cycle Tracking
category_features.definition: Follow the progression of a task associated with performance reviews

category_features.name: Self Assessment
category_features.definition: An individual's evaluation of his or her own strengths, weaknesses, and skills

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Skills Assessment
category_features.definition: Observe employees over a period of time to gain an understanding of their abilities to perform certain tasks

category_features.name: Weighted Performance Measures
category_features.definition: Assess skills, outcomes and results using preset metrics and averages

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: Identify patterns in assembled data

related_products.short_desc: ZipRecruiter makes talent management easy by matching your jobs with candidates who have the right skills and experience.
related_products.features:
Rated the #1 hiring site by employers in the U.S.,* ZipRecruiter makes talent management easy by helping you match your open positions to the candidates that have the right skills and experience. The all-in-one dashboard lets you track, manage, and rate job applicants, as well as connect with candidates. 

*Based on Trustpilot rating of hiring sites with over 1,000 reviews.

related_products.short_desc: monday.com Work OS is the customizable, no-code platform that helps you improve your talent management strategy and hiring process.
related_products.features: Improve your recruitment strategy with talent management software that simplifies the hiring process and better the employee experience. monday.com Work OS is the fully customizable, no-code work platform that enables more efficient HR management and workflows with the help of clever features such as automations, integrations, real-time collaboration, file sharing, and visual dashboards. Make data-driven hiring decisions, keep employees productive, and work smarter together in one place.

related_products.short_desc: With the BambooHR ATS and Performance Management features, organizations have the capacity to grow and change with their employees.
related_products.features: BambooHR gives organizations the capacity to grow and change based on the people they bring on board and how they develop them. With the Applicant Tracking System, HR professionals and hiring managers can find, evaluate, and hire the right talent as quickly as possible. Onboarding features help to create better first days for new hires, and BambooHR Performance Management makes managing employee growth and development a pain-free experience.

related_products.short_desc: Rippling makes it easy to manage your Payroll, Benefits, HR, and IT -- all in one, modern platform.
related_products.features:
Rippling makes it easy to manage your company's Payroll, Benefits, HR, and IT -- all in one, modern platform. It brings all of your employee systems and data together, and helps automate your busy work.

Take onboarding, for example. With Rippling, you can just click a button, and in 90 seconds set up a new hires payroll, health insurance, 401K, work computer, and apps  like Slack, Zoom, and Office 365.

related_products.short_desc: The market's most advanced end-to-end recruitment ERP.
related_products.features: JobDiva is a global leader in Platform as a Service (PaaS) technology for staffing enterprises, incorporating a patent-protected recruiting engine and supported by a full suite of advanced features to drive the hiring process from first engagement to hire and on-boarding, along with a partner ecosystem of 150+ integrations. JobDiva has 40,000+ users globally. JobDiva helps organizations find talent faster, engage with greater ease and achieve commanding growth.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based human resources solution that helps businesses streamline workforce planning, talent management, and payroll processes.
related_products.features: Workday HCM is a single, cloud-based solution for workforce planning, talent management, and payroll processes. The solution is used by Fortune 500 and G2k companies to operate with agility and efficiency, and for organizations to be ready for whatever comes next. Unlike rigid HR systems or point solutions, Workday HCM delivers a skills-based HCM foundation and continuously innovates to enable customer success as the impact of technology, alternative work arrangements, and employee expectations evolve.

related_products.short_desc: Reduce time-to-fill with Zoho Recruit's effective talent management tools, and hire applicants using powerful automation tools.
related_products.features: The current job market is 90% candidate-driven. Providing the best candidate experience possible is one of the best employer branding strategies a company can have and should be the priority for any recruiter. With Zoho Recruit's robust talent management software, qualifying and ranking candidates is a breeze. You can also build and maintain a healthier relationship with both candidates and clients, making it easier to make placements where a new-hire will truly thrive.

related_products.short_desc: Supported by technologies like I-9, E-Verify, and WOTC, iCIMS ATS seamlessly integrates with the largest HCM and payroll systems.
related_products.features: Built for enterprise organizations, the iCIMS Talent Cloud is a unified recruitment platform that empowers you at every stage of the talent continuum, allowing you to attract, engage, hire and advance the world's best talent. The iCIMS Talent Cloud is complemented by an ecosystem of more than 300 partner solutions. More than 4,000 clients worldwide, including about 40% of the Fortune 100, rely on iCIMS technology to power their recruitment efforts.

related_products.short_desc: The BEST Workforce Management, HR & Employee scheduling solution that helps organizations manage shifts, payroll, leaves, overtime etc
related_products.features: UKG/Kronos Workforce Ready is a human capital management suite of tools on a single unified cloud platform that helps you manage the entire employee lifecycle from pre-hire to retire. Solutions for HR, recruiting, onboarding, time tracking, payroll, and more are easily accessed through a single intuitive interface. Automated and scalable tools provide a single source of truth with common reporting, dashboards, and robust workflows. Included self-service and mobile app allow easy, anytime access.

related_products.short_desc: With Paycom's all-in-one software, you can boost employee satisfaction by linking performance with compensation.
related_products.features: Paycom provides user-friendly HR and payroll technology to enhance the entire employee life cycle, all in a single software. From onboarding and benefits enrollment to talent management and more, Paycom streamlines processes, drives efficiencies, increases data integrity and gives employees power over their own HR information through a self-service app. With Paycom's all-in-one software, you can boost employee satisfaction and control salary budgets by linking performance with compensation.

related_products.short_desc: Dayforce Talent Management transforms the employee experience. For organisations with between 500 and 50,000 employees.
related_products.features:
Today's workforce requires a Talent Management strategy that continuously engages and empowers employees. By combining all aspects of an employee's journey in a single HCM solution, Dayforce enables you to manage your employees throughout their employment - from hire to inspire to retire.
Dayforce Talent Management gives you the platform you need to effectively attract, onboard, communicate, develop, compensate and reward employees.

similar_products.short_desc: With the BambooHR ATS and Performance Management features, organizations have the capacity to grow and change with their employees.
similar_products.features: BambooHR gives organizations the capacity to grow and change based on the people they bring on board and how they develop them. With the Applicant Tracking System, HR professionals and hiring managers can find, evaluate, and hire the right talent as quickly as possible. Onboarding features help to create better first days for new hires, and BambooHR Performance Management makes managing employee growth and development a pain-free experience.

similar_products.short_desc: Lattice makes people management software that allows forward-thinking HR admins to build and engage high-performing teams.
similar_products.features: Lattice is a people management platform that gives People Leaders solutions to build engaged, high-performing teams. They empower HR teams to make more strategic, data-driven business decisions and build winning cultures through continuous performance management  Goals, 1:1s, Updates, Real-Time Feedback and Reviews  and rich employee engagement insights. Their customers include Slack, Asana, Reddit, and 1,850+ more.

similar_products.short_desc: Create more human experiences for all talent and unlock the skills and potential of your global workforce.
similar_products.features: Beamery's Talent Lifecycle Management platform allows enterprises to create more human experiences for all talent, and unlock the skills and potential of their global workforce. We help organizations identify and acquire top talent, move the needle on DE&I, close key skill gaps and retain top performers.

similar_products.short_desc: WorkTango enables companies to give their employees a voice and easily collect feedback for any purpose to support actionable insight.
similar_products.features:
The WorkTango platform creates a space for employees to have a voice and helps companies easily gather frequent feedback for any engagement, transformation, or feedback initiative. 

Using data science and natural language understanding, actionable insights from employee feedback are served in real-time to Human Resources, C-Suite executives, and people leaders. 

The results are quicker insight, better people actionable decisions, and a more aligned and engaged workforce.

similar_products.short_desc: monday.com Work OS is the customizable, no-code platform that helps you improve your talent management strategy and hiring process.
similar_products.features: Improve your recruitment strategy with talent management software that simplifies the hiring process and better the employee experience. monday.com Work OS is the fully customizable, no-code work platform that enables more efficient HR management and workflows with the help of clever features such as automations, integrations, real-time collaboration, file sharing, and visual dashboards. Make data-driven hiring decisions, keep employees productive, and work smarter together in one place.

similar_products.short_desc: NEOED provides a high quality and easy-to-use talent management system to service educational institutions.
similar_products.features: NEOED provides a high quality and easy-to-use talent management system to service educational institutions. Serving hundreds of campus communities, the company's system supports the entire employee lifecycle, automating recruitment, onboarding, training, and performance management. Customers say NEOED helps them save time and money, reduce paper processes, maintain stringent compliance requirements, increase employee productivity and engagement, and improve diversity and inclusion efforts.

similar_products.short_desc: PageUp is a powerful talent acquisition platform with unique capabilities to transform hiring and engagement experiences for all.
similar_products.features:
PageUp is a powerful talent management platform with unique capabilities to transform hiring and engagement experiences for all. It's the experience-driven technology you've been dreaming of.

Unlike other SaaS talent acquisition or management providers, PageUp offers a full suite of modern tools to help businesses attract, engage, and retain high performing teams and deliver measurable results.

similar_products.short_desc: Leapsome is a talent management platform used by CEOs and HR teams to develop their people and scale their business.
similar_products.features:
CEOs & HR teams in forward-thinking companies including Spotify, Northvolt, and Babbel use Leapsome to create a continuous cycle of performance management and personalized learning that powers employee engagement and the success of their business.

As a people management platform, Leapsome combines tools for Goals & OKRs Management, Performance Reviews & 360s, Employee Learning & Onboarding, Employee Engagement Surveys, Feedback & Praise, and Meetings.

similar_products.short_desc: Grayscale is a texting and automation platform designed for modern hiring teams.
similar_products.features:
Grayscale is a texting and automation platform designed for hiring teams. We make it seamless to engage talent, automate workflows, and deliver a high-touch candidate experience.

We integrate deeply with ATS's like Greenhouse, Lever, Workday, SAP SuccessFactors, UKG Pro, ADP, Brassring, Comeet, and Paycom.

similar_products.short_desc: Learning solutions designed to help healthcare organizations create, organize, & manage learning & empower staff to deliver best care.
similar_products.features: A healthcare organization's approach to learning directly impacts patient care and employee satisfaction and retention. HealthStream's Learning & Performance Solutions enhance organizational & staff development through effective and engaging learning experiences. By implementing contemporary, adaptive, and relevant learner-centric strategies, HealthStream helps your organization identify and develop top performers with performance management solutions that create a culture of great patient care.

similar_products.short_desc: Recruitee is the number one collaborative hiring software to build winning teams.
similar_products.features: Recruitee delivers the complete solution to help internal HR teams work with the rest of their organization to hire better, together. As an easy-to-use collaborative hiring software, thousands of scaling businesses like Taco Bell, M&S, and Staples have used Recruitee's recruitment management and applicant tracking system to find, interview, and hire the best talent. More than 181,000 users from 5000+ companies are using our software to hire the best people!

similar_products.short_desc: TalentGuard is a global provider of competency-based talent management solutions delivered as Software-as-a-Service.
similar_products.features: TalentGuard is a global provider of competency-based talent management solutions delivered as Software-as-a-Service. Our cloud-based software suite is unmatched in its ability to engage and retain employees. Our integrated technology helps organizations automate performance management, 360 degree feedback, career pathing, succession planning, individual development planning and certification tracking, and is seamlessly integrated with HRIS, Applicant Tracking, Compensation Management and LMS.

similar_products.short_desc: Establish goals and growth plans to help employees progress and succeed, helping managers and employees align and track progress.
similar_products.features: In bob, you can establish goals and growth plans to help employees progress and succeed. Not only will these goals support employees, but they'll also help managers and employees align their expectations. Depending on how your business functions, you can set goals as part of a team-, department-, or company-wide strategy. Goals can also be tracked as part of a performance review, to keep employees on track and set them up for success.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top 360 Degree Feedback software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of 360 Degree Feedback tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: 360 Degree Feedback software is designed to help human resource departments gather all-around information about an employee. Unlike performance assessment software, 360 Degree Feedback applications allow organizations to collect information not only from superiors but also from peers and subordinates, as well as clients. The information collected can be used either for assessment or training purposes. 360 Degree Feedback software is related to Performance Appraisal software, Survey software and Human Resource software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Applicant Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Applicant Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Applicant Tracking software allows organizations to easily manage the hiring process by maintaining a database of applicant and job information. Applicant Tracking solutions can be used by organizations to collect applicant information and then filter, grade and match candidates' skills against job requirements. Many Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) include an interface that allows recruiters to manage all of an organization's job openings. Applicant Tracking software is related to Human Resource software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Compensation Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Compensation Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Compensation Management software helps organizations improve employees' motivation and retention by structuring performance-based benefits, streamlining payment adjustments across the company and tracking compensation payouts. Compensation Management software is related to Talent Management software, Performance Appraisal software, Commission software and Payroll software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Engagement software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Engagement tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Engagement software aims to assist managers with maintaining employee awareness of corporate culture and increasing their level of investment in the company. Employee surveys, gamification tools, team sentiment analytics, and applications that streamline communication are all represented.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Recognition software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Recognition tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Recognition solutions assist with keeping employees feeling engaged and appreciated at work. This software facilitates peer recognition on corporate and team discussion boards, administration of awards and loyalty programs, as well as extensive reporting and analytics. Employee Recognition software is related to HR software and Talent Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Learning Management Systems (LMS) on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Learning Management Systems (LMS) and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Learning Management Systems (LMS) provide a framework through which learning content is delivered and managed. An LMS allows for an anytime, anywhere learning environment, delivering and tracking eLearning courses and testing. A Learning Content Management System (LCMS) enables the organization to learn content from Courseware authoring tools and presentation of the content to students. Learning Management Systems are related to Training software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Onboarding software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Onboarding tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Onboarding software eliminates the need for paper forms and automates workflows associated with getting a new hire up and running with the company.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Performance Appraisal tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Performance Management software automates the process of reviewing employee performance, setting new objectives, and writing individual development plans. A type of Performance Management solution is 360 degree feedback software, which manages the process in which an employee completes a self-evaluation and is also evaluated by their manager, peers, and direct reports. Performance Management software is related to 360 Degree Feedback software, Human Resource software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Recruiting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Recruiting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Recruiting software helps recruiting, staffing and hiring agencies manage their operations by maintaining a database of applicant and job information. These solutions are used by organizations to collect applicant information and then filter, grade and match candidates skills against job requirements. Recruiting software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Human Resource software, Talent Management software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Reference Check software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Reference Check tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Reference Check software streamlines and automates the process of requesting and collecting job references. There are two types of Reference Check software. In the first type, candidates provide their referees? contact information to recruiters who then reach out to the referees through Reference Check software. The second type of software is a platform accessible by referees, candidates, recruiters, and HR professionals that allows candidates to reach out to the referees and collect references directly.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Succession Planning software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Succession Planning tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Succession Planning software helps organizations identify and develop promotable employees for all the key areas in the company. These applications assist with retention of talent and help organizations prepare smooth transitions when a change in leadership is necessary. In order to avoid duplication of effort in data collection, Succession Planning software can integrate with other HR applications, such as talent management or performance appraisal solutions. For related software solutions see Talent Management software, Workforce Management software, Training software and Performance Appraisal software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Training software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Training tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Training software, also known as eLearning or Computer-Based Training (CBT) software, automates educational activities for students and/or corporate employees. Training solutions are often customizable based on the needs of specific organizations and include capabilities such as course registration and testing, certification tracking, conferencing, skills tracking, and reporting. Training applications may provide the framework for presenting classes, as well as an ecommerce functions, to allow for payments. Training software is related to Courseware and Learning Management Systems (LMS).

_source.short_desc: Pick and choose from a comprehensive set of HR modules built for small and medium sized businesses. Easy to use and easy to implement.
_source.long_desc: For 12 years, SpriggHR has offered a cost-effective, user-friendly, comprehensive set of HR best practices specifically built for small and medium sized business. Features include Goal Setting, Competencies, Performance Evaluations, Development Planning, 360 Feedback, Compensation, and even Vacation / Time-Off Tracking. Sprigg facilitates regular touch-point meetings and real-time feedback that promote communication between managers and their people. Sprigg is easy to use and easy to implement.
_source.pricing_details:
Sprigg offers monthly and annual subscriptions based on number of users. Details include:
Twigg (Small Business Essentials) -  starting at $165/ month ($2,000/year)
Sprigg (Comprehensive Performance Management) - starting at $210/month ($2,500/year)

category_features.name: Compensation Plan Modeling

category_features.name: Compensation Statements
category_features.definition: Creates employee benefits statements that include all of a business? perks and incentives.

category_features.name: Employee Reward Programs
category_features.definition: Builds a system of rewards to encourage performance and link employee outcomes to business needs.

category_features.name: Incentive Management
category_features.definition: Manages incentive programs such as profit sharing, stock awards, and individual bonus plans,

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Salary Planning
category_features.definition: Manages salary reviews. Budgets, benchmarks and tracks all salary processes and associated costs.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based human resources solution that helps businesses streamline workforce planning, talent management, and payroll processes.
related_products.features: Workday HCM is a single, cloud-based solution for workforce planning, talent management, and payroll processes. The solution is used by Fortune 500 and G2k companies to operate with agility and efficiency, and for organizations to be ready for whatever comes next. Unlike rigid HR systems or point solutions, Workday HCM delivers a skills-based HCM foundation and continuously innovates to enable customer success as the impact of technology, alternative work arrangements, and employee expectations evolve.

related_products.short_desc: CaptivateIQ is the highest-rated compensation management software on the market. Customers include Intercom, Gong, and Clari.
related_products.features:
CaptivateIQ is modernizing how businesses compensate their hardworking sales teams with an automated and flexible compensation management solution. 

Pay your reps accurately and on time so they can be more productive. Share insights with sales leadership on which plans are growing the business. Minimize human-error and hours spent calculating commissions each month.

We believe that hard work should be rewarded and that there's a smarter way to do that than with complicated spreadsheets.

related_products.short_desc: Branch enables businesses to accelerate payments to their workforce with our comprehensive workforce payments platform.
related_products.features:
Branch enables businesses to accelerate payments to their workforce with our comprehensive workforce payments platform.

Companies turn to Branch to empower workers with tools like instant payments, free earned wage access, and cashless tips/mileage reimbursements. As part of our platform, workers receive the Branch Wallet: a digital wallet backed by a fee-free checking account, optional debit card, financial wellness tools, and rewards.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based HCM platform bringing together payroll, time + attendance, and HR for organisations with between 500 and 50,000 employees.
related_products.features: Dayforce is a global HCM platform that transforms the employee experience. It unifies data from across the entire employee lifecycle to enable better decision-making at every level. Dayforce is a comprehensive cloud platform that combines HR, payroll, workforce management and talent management in a single application. Our scalable platform is built with a single, flexible rules engine combined with real-time updates and calculations that help address complex regulatory requirements.

related_products.short_desc: Performio is the only enterprise-grade incentive compensation management software that's easy to use and gets you live in weeks.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Commission software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Commission tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Commission software improves sales productivity by centralizing and automating an organization's commission-based incentive plans. Commission applications allow performance tracking and reporting among employees, calculation of commission compensation based on performance variables and the management of key dates in the company's sales or compensation cycle. Commission tracking software can also help manage regulatory reporting requirements related to compensation or bonuses. Commission software is related to Lead Management software, Payroll software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Payroll software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Payroll tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Payroll software automates the management of employees' salaries, wages, bonuses and deductions. Time off, vacation accrual, benefits and retirement accounts can also be tracked by a Payroll software system. These applications allow businesses to keep the payroll process in-house. Payroll software can be standalone, but often integrates with an organization's accounting software. Payroll software Human Resource software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Performance Appraisal tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Performance Management software automates the process of reviewing employee performance, setting new objectives, and writing individual development plans. A type of Performance Management solution is 360 degree feedback software, which manages the process in which an employee completes a self-evaluation and is also evaluated by their manager, peers, and direct reports. Performance Management software is related to 360 Degree Feedback software, Human Resource software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Talent Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Talent Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Talent Management software gives employers the tools to accurately manage, evaluate, and compensate based on employee performance. By tracking performance and standards, Talent Management software allows companies to create and maintain a high-performance workforce. Key features of this type of software include employee learning, compensation evaluations, policy compliance, and succession planning, all of which help companies manage personnel growth. Directories related to Talent Management software are Human Resource software, Performance Appraisal software, Succession Planning software, Training software, Workforce Management software, and Applicant Tracking software.
